templateData.kat:
The Blaze Pet can have its rarity upgraded from {{Common}} all the way up to {{Legendary}} by Kat. When upgrading [[Pets]] through Kat the pet will keep all of its Pet Experience. However due to the scaling EXP needed the pet will lose some [[Pets#Leveling|Pet Levels]] depending on the new rarity. Kat will reduce the amount of {{Coins}} needed per level of the Pet. This discount is {{color|green|0.3%}} per level of the base price. {{Kat Cost |cost_common_level_1 = {{Coins|250,000}}
128 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_blaze_powder.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Blaze Powder]] [[Enchanted Blaze Powder]] |cost_common_level_100 = {{Coins|175,000}}

256 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_blaze_powder.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Blaze Powder]] [[Enchanted Blaze Powder]] |cost_uncommon_level_100 = {{Coins|350,000}}

512 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_blaze_powder.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Blaze Powder]] [[Enchanted Blaze Powder]] |cost_rare_level_100 = {{Coins|700,000}}

8 [[File:SkyBlock_items_enchanted_blaze_rod.gif|25px|link=Enchanted Blaze Rod]] [[Enchanted Blaze Rod]] |cost_epic_level_100 = {{Coins|1,750,000}}
